about_the_game:
• Includes the costumes and music of characters from the Yakuza / Like a Dragon series. Also includes newly arranged music from Virtua Fighter 3 and additional stamps to hype up the fights.

Includes:
・650 Character customization items
・19 Character costumes
・19 Yakuza series character costumes
・20 Yakuza series BGM
・20 "Virtua Fighter 3" arranged BGM
・40 Spectator stamps
